definition: an act of urging on or spurring on or rousing to action or instigating
details:
noun
- an act of urging on or spurring on or rousing to action or instigating
= example: an act of urging on or spurring on or rousing to action or instigating
= synonyms: incitation
- the act of exhorting
= synonyms: exhortation
- needed encouragement
= synonyms: provocation
- something that incites or provokes
= synonyms: provocation
